ai-tika-vin02t18:42_4: For the Buddhas awakened to all kinds of fame, conceived the religion of the Buddhas, and having compassion for all beings. That is why, the one is intent on charming gold, the boat, the lord of death, and the paths at the time of the time when they come to visit the Buddhas, and in order to go and visit the time of the great alteration. This is the fourth blessings (of the Faith).
